getExeNameOfCodeAtSite

String[] getExeNameOfCodeAtSite(String site,
                                String code,
                                String version)
Get the name of the executable to be run. This may or may not be same as the name of the code. For instance 'List' maps to ls.

Parameters:
site - The site to check
code - The code to check
version - The version of the code
Returns:
The executable name of the code
